variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: NIH3
variable.description: Was assessment within 24 hours of (suspected) stroke?

variable.name: NIH18
variable.description: Is this a baseline or follow-up stroke scale assessment?

variable.name: NIH19
variable.description: Compared to previous VISP NIH Stroke Scale assessment, within the same section has the patient moved one or more points higher in any of questions 4-aa1, 12-15?
variable.value: Yes - increase of 1 or more points

variable.name: NIH20
variable.description: Can the increase in NIH Stroke Scale be attributed to any disease process other than recurrent stroke?

variable.name: NIH21
variable.description: If yes, what is the alternate explanation

variable.name: NIH22
variable.description: (Question 22 removed)

variable.name: NIH24
variable.description: Code number of person conducting this evaluation

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data

variable.name: FSEQNO
variable.description: Form sequence number

variable.name: LINENO
variable.description: Line number

variable.name: NIH3A
variable.description: If yes, number of hours since (suspected) stroke occurrence?

variable.name: NIH4
variable.description: What was the level of consciousness score?
variable.value: Not alert, but arousable by minor stimulation to obey, answer, or respond
Not alert, requires repeated stimulation to attend
Responds only with reflex motor or autonomic effects etc.

variable.name: NIH5
variable.description: What was the level of consciousness questions score?

variable.name: NIH6
variable.description: What was the level of consciousness command score?

variable.name: NIH7
variable.description: What was the best gaze score?
variable.value: Forced deviation or total gaze paresis etc.

variable.name: NIH8
variable.description: What was the visual score?

variable.name: NIH9
variable.description: What was the facial palsy score?
variable.value: Complete paralysis of one or both sides

variable.name: NIH10A
variable.description: What is the motor movement score for the left arm?
variable.value: Drift, limb holds 90 (or 45) degree, but drifts down
No effort against gravity, limb falls

variable.name: NIH10B
variable.description: What was the motor score for the right arm?
variable.value: Drift, limb holds 90 (or 45) degree, but drifts down
No effort against gravity, limb falls

variable.name: NIH10C
variable.description: What was the motor score in the left leg?
variable.value: Drift, limb holds 90 (or 45) degree, but drifts down
No effort against gravity, limb falls

variable.name: NIH10D
variable.description: What was the motor score in the right leg?
variable.value: Drift, limb holds 90 (or 45) degree, but drifts down
No effort against gravity, limb falls

variable.name: NIH11A
variable.description: What was the limb ataxia score?

variable.name: NIH11B
variable.description: Is ataxia present in the right arm?

variable.name: NIH11C
variable.description: Is ataxia present in the left arm?

variable.name: NIH11D
variable.description: Is ataxia present in the right leg?

variable.name: NIH11E
variable.description: Is ataxia present in the left leg?

variable.name: NIH12
variable.description: What was the sensory score?

variable.name: NIH13
variable.description: What was the best language score?

variable.name: NIH14
variable.description: What was the dysarthria score?

variable.name: NIH15
variable.description: What was the Extinction and Inattention (formerly Neglect) score?
variable.value: Visual, tactile, auditory, spatial or personnel inattention

variable.name: NIH16
variable.description: What was the distal motor function of the left arm?
variable.value: At least some extension after 5 sec

variable.name: NIH17
variable.description: What was the distal motor function of the right arm?
variable.value: At least some extension after 5 sec

variable.name: NIH23
variable.description: Total score

variable.name: NIH1B
variable.description: Is this the baseline assessment?

variable.name: NIH1C
variable.description: Since the last administration of the NIH Stroke Scale, has the patient experienced any symptoms consistent with a recurrent stroke?

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time

variable.name: NIH1AFUT
variable.description: Date of the NIH stroke scale assessment

variable.name: NIH2AFUT
variable.description: Date of most recent (suspected) stroke

variable.name: GARNETID
variable.description: GARNET ID
